title: BPNet quality metric
description: Schema for reporting BPNet quality metric

count_spearman_peaks.title: Spearman correlation across peak regions in test set
count_spearman_peaks.description: Median over all test folds of the Spearman rank correlation between observed and predicted log(total counts) across peak regions

count_spearman_allregions.title: Spearman correlation across all regions in test set
count_spearman_allregions.description: Median over all test folds of the Spearman rank correlation between observed and predicted log(total counts) across all regions

count_pearson_peaks.title: Pearson correlation across peak regions in test set
count_pearson_peaks.description: Median over all test folds of the Pearson rank correlation between observed and predicted log(total counts) across peak regions

count_pearson_allregions.title: Pearson correlation across all regions in test test
count_pearson_allregions.description: Median over all test folds of the Pearson rank correlation between observed and predicted log(total counts) across all regions

profile_normjsd_peaks.title: Profile concordance (normalized Jensen-Shannon distance) across peak regions in test set
profile_normjsd_peaks.description: Median over all test folds of the median min-max normalized Jensen Shannon distance between observed and predicted profiles across peak regions

auprc.title: Area under precision recall curve classifying peaks against background regions in test set
auprc.description: Median over all test folds of the Area under the precision recall curve (computed as average precision) for classifying peak regions against background regions

auroc.title: Area under receiver operating curve classifying peaks against background regions in test set
auroc.description: Median over all test folds of the Area under the receiver operating curve for classifying peak regions against background regions
